info.name: Company Case
info.description:
# Company Management System - Enoca Assigment

## Table of Contents

- [Dependencies Used]()
- [Run the App]()
- [Test App on Postman]()
- [Usage]()
- [Contributing]()
- [License]()
    

## Dependencies Used

- [Spring Framework]()
    - [Spring Boot]()
    - [Spring Web]()
    - [Spring Data]()
    - [Spring Validation]()
    - [Spring Test]()
    - [TestContainer]()
    - [Lombok]()
- [Postgresql]()
- [PG Admin 4]()
- [Java JDK 17]()
- [Maven]()
- [Docker]()
    

## ðŸ”¨ Run the App

#### Maven & Docker

**1 )** Download your project from this link shown below

```
    git clone https://github.com/Eukolos/enoca-assignment.git

 ```

**2 )** Go to the project's home directory shown below

```
    cd enoca-assignment

 ```

**3 )** Create native image though this command shown below

```
    mvn -Pnative spring-boot:build-image

 ```

**4 )** Run the project though this command shown below

```
    docker-compose up

 ```

## Test App on Postman

- **Payment Integration:** The project has been integrated with Stripe API, enabling users to make payments securely and conveniently.
    - _**The Stripe API listens to a specific URL for notifications**_
